mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_metadata_entity WHERE type_id != #{type} and type_id !=6 and del_flag=1 ORDER BY name
SELECT * FROM tb_metadata_entity WHERE parent_id = #{id} and type_id =6 and del_flag=1 ORDER BY name
SELECT * FROM tb_metadata_entity WHERE type_id != #{type} and del_flag=1 and LEFT (name , 5) != "temp_" ORDER BY name
SELECT * FROM tb_metadata_entity WHERE type_id != #{type} and type_id != #{fieldType} and del_flag=1 and LEFT (name , 5) != "temp_" ORDER BY name

SELECT tb1.id, tb1.name tbname, tb1.description tbdes, lmr.from_entity_id fromid, lmr.to_entity_id toid, lmr.id lmid FROM tb_metadata_entity tb1 LEFT JOIN tb_lineage_map_relation lmr on tb1.id = lmr.metadata_entity_id WHERE tb1.id = #{guid} AND tb1.del_flag = 1

SELECT tme.id guid, tme.`name` ename, tme.display_name display_name, tme.qualified_name qname, tmp.type tname, tme1.name parent1, tme2.name parent2 FROM tb_metadata_entity tme LEFT JOIN tb_metadata_entity_type tmp ON tme.type_id = tmp.id LEFT JOIN tb_metadata_entity tme1 ON tme.parent_id = tme1.id LEFT JOIN tb_metadata_entity tme2 ON tme1.parent_id = tme2.id WHERE (tme.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query},'%') OR tme.display_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query},'%')) AND (tme.description != 'stg' or tme.description is null) AND tme.del_flag = 1 LIMIT #{offset} , #{limit}
